ref: 13501 suraṅgī f. ʻ a red -- flowered Moringa ʼ lex., ˚ga -- n. ʻ red sanders ʼ W., ˚gikā -- f. ʻ Sanseviera roxburghiana ʼ lex., surañjana -- m. ʻ betel nut tree ʼ lex. [suraṅga -- ?]

M. surãg, ˚gī f. ʻ the tree Pterocarpus santalinus ʼ, surãj̈ m. ʻ its roots, red sanders ʼ, surãjī f. ʻ the tree ʼ.
